advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Worth has transformed the landscape of financial information, serving high net worth individuals with an avid interest in the intelligent stewardship of their personal wealth. Worth continues to win acclaim for its engaging and inspiring content and reader-friendly style.
 
Presented with cutting-edge design in a quietly luxurious format, the magazine is today’s sophisticated, practical and portable resource for C-suite executives, entrepreneurs and high net worth investors. Each issue addresses the financial, legal and lifestyle issues unique to high net worth individuals and is organized into four sections:MAKE focuses on wealth creation and entrepreneurship; GROW centers on wealth management and investing; LIVE highlights philanthropy, lifestyle and passion investing; and CURATOR which covers the absolute best -- and smartest -- in luxury from around the globe.

This app includes downloadable versions of all new issues of Worth via in-app purchasing, as well as the option to subscribe to get first access to all of the newest issues as they're released. 

Subscriptions are optional, and last for one year from the date of purchase and cost $49.99/year, and are automatically renewed until canceled. Your credit card will automatically be charged for another subscription period (another year for annual subscribers) unless you change your subscription preferences in your account settings.
